actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, with respect to the recrediting of sick leave of employees previously separated from the service for not more than 3 years, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the recrediting of sick leave of Federal employees previously separated from the service for not more than three years. (Adds 5 U.S.C. 6313)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, with respect to the recrediting of sick leave of employees previously separated from the service for not more than 3 years, and for other purposes.
